feature.label: eUptime
feature.description: eUptime Eclipse plugin allows to display as a widget the running Eclipse's uptime, using colors to indicate if it's a long running one or not.
feature.copyright:
eUptime - an Eclipse widget allowing to indicate its uptime using some fancy colors. Definitively not the most useful thing on earth, but at least I wanted it.
